title: Male bottlenose dolphins form bachelor groups with their relatives

title_detail.value: Male bottlenose dolphins form bachelor groups with their relatives

summary: New research has analysed the behavior of 12 dolphin social groups in South Australia's Coffin Bay region and shows males who team up in groups of two to five to form beneficial alliances may have more success.

summary_detail.value: New research has analysed the behavior of 12 dolphin social groups in South Australia's Coffin Bay region and shows males who team up in groups of two to five to form beneficial alliances may have more success.
